items.title: Kids' Power Pack
items.description: A Cuties® Mandarin Orange, Yogurt Smoothie, Carrots and Whole-Grain “Fish” Crackers, served with choice of small DASANI® Water or small Lowfat Milk. Meets Disney Nutrition Guidelines for Complete Meals without substitutions
